scripts.set-service-credentials: sls config credentials --provider aws --profile quarkus_ssm --stage dev --overwrite
scripts.start-local: serverless export-env --aws-profile quarkus_ssm && mvn compile quarkus:dev -Daws.profile=quarkus_ssm
scripts.deploy: export JAVA_HOME=`/usr/libexec/java_home -v 11.0` && mvn clean install -Dquarkus.http.root-path=/jvm -Dquarkus.package.uber-jar=true && mvn clean install -Dquarkus.http.root-path=/native -Dnative -Dnative-image.docker-build=true -DbuildDirectory=target-native && sls deploy --aws-profile quarkus_ssm
scripts.deploy-win: mvn clean install -Dquarkus.http.root-path=/jvm -Dquarkus.package.uber-jar=true && mvn clean install -Dquarkus.http.root-path=/native -Dnative -Dnative-image.docker-build=true -DbuildDirectory=target-native && sls deploy --aws-profile quarkus_ssm
